CustomField.formula: IF( AND( NOT(ISBLANK(Drawing__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(Drawing__r.WeightKG__c)) ), DispatchedQuantity__c * 1000 / Drawing__r.WeightKG__c, IF( AND( NOT(ISBLANK(KLWSpec__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(KLWSpec__r.WeightKG__c)) ), DispatchedQuantity__c * 1000 / KLWSpec__r.WeightKG__c, IF( NOT(ISBLANK(Quantity_pcs__c)), DispatchedQuantity__c / (Quantity / Quantity_pcs__c), IF( NOT(ISBLANK(Quantity_m__c)), DispatchedQuantity__c / (Quantity / Quantity_m__c), IF( NOT(ISBLANK(Quantity_ft__c)), DispatchedQuantity__c / (Quantity / Quantity_ft__c), 0 ) ) ) ) )
CustomField.label: DispatchedQuantity (pcs)
